question: Which Bank is set to use satellite data to provide credit facilities to farmers?
explanation:
One of Indiaâ€™s largest private sector lenders ICICI Bank has decided to use satellite data to assess rainfall and harvesting patterns of the country.
The Bank will combine this data with financial analytics to assess rainfall and harvesting patterns and to offer quick and hassle-free loans to farmers. This new feature is expected to bring down the loan processing time to less than 15 days.
